page.title: 12INDOOR LEISURE, SALTCOATS
page.content: Saltcoats has a wide range of indoor leisure activities, with several amusement arcades, squash clubs,a swimming pool and{Ardeer Recreation {Club}- opened by{I.C.I.}for their workers but now with a much wider membership. The club offers bowling, darts, snooker, pool, dancing, karate and badminton. Many{local pubs}take part in keenly fought darts, pool and "Mastermind" competitions. The growing indoor sport is{Snooker and recently the{Westbury Snooker {Club}opened in a renovated Primary School. There are{2 cinemas}- one with 2 screens - and they are well used. At{Sandylands caravan site}there is Bingo, amusements, trampolines, pool and regular cabarets in the summer.
